doc:
Lauren Tom https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lauren_Tom 0 Lauren Tom (born August 4, 1961) is an American actress and voice actress. Her roles include Lena St. Clair in The Joy Luck Club, Julie in the NBC sitcom Friends, Dot in the final season of Grace Under Fire, and the voices for both mother and daughter characters on three animated TV comedy series: on Futurama she voiced Amy Wong and her mother Inez, on King of the Hill as Minh and Connie Souphanousinphone. She portrays Celia Mack in the Disney Channel series Andi Mack. Lauren_Tom ( born August_4_,_1961 ) is an_American_actress_and_voice_actress . Her_roles include Lena_St._Clair in The_Joy_Luck_Club , Julie in the_NBC_sitcom_Friends , Dot in the_final_season of Grace Under Fire , and the_voices for both_mother_and_daughter_characters on three_animated_TV_comedy_series : on Futurama she voiced Amy_Wong and her_mother_Inez , on King of the_Hill as Minh and Connie_Souphanousinphone . She portrays Celia_Mack in the_Disney_Channel_series_Andi_Mack .
